roleset.name: set to a starting value, format
roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to formatting.01 and set.01. Framed by Katie.

example.name: initialize-v: with arg0 and arg1
example.text: At most, give a hard connecting point PRO-1 to initialize the fault recorder for this line.
example.arg: the fault recorder for this line.

example.name: initialize-v: with arg2
example.text: Why should you check a static variable for nil if it-1 was initialized *-1 to nil on the previous line?
